Html:
Roman,

Your new project looks very promising, especially the packaging concept.  The only real short-coming I see is that LINQ-to-SQL natively supports only MS SQL which you mention and reference two other libraries.

Are you planning on providing some documentation and/or examples on setting up VITA to use databases other than MS SQL?

Thanks,

MindCore

When God made time, he made plenty of it  (Irish proverb)

 - and I'm still searching for my fair share :(

Honestly, with 2 open source projects, day-time job - I don't think I can handle this. I was kinda hoping that one of you guys, with vested interest can help with the effort for particular servers. Vested interest, I mean - with need for a decent ORM and having non-MS-SQL database as platform. 

Otherwise, I don't see how this might happen. 

thanks for your kind words and friendly feedback!

Roman
